LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.description: A portable automatic turret. Requires industrial ammo to reload. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.description: A heavy automatic turret. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but requires industrial ammo to reload. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.label: heavy slug turret
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.description: An armor-piercing turret. Its ultra-dense uranium barrel can punch through heavy armor, but it requires new heavy slugs to be loaded after use. It's more accurate at longer ranges, and can't fire at all close up. May explode when damaged.
